```{r, echo = F, eval = T, message = F, warning = F}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(htmltools)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(DT)
library(glue)

data = readRDS("~/random_rprojects/find-aphasia-research/data/data_dt.rds") 

data_prep = data %>%
  arrange(desc(date)) %>%
  mutate(
         link=paste0("list_view.html#",NCTId),
         Name = paste0("<a href=", link, ">",BriefTitle,"</a>"),
         date = format(date, format="%B %d, %Y")) %>%
  select(`Start Date` = date, Name) %>%
  distinct()

```


```{r, layout = "l-body-outset"}
DT::datatable(data_prep, escape = F, options = list(scrollX=TRUE, pageLength=5), rownames = FALSE)
```
